page.title: 11TRAFFIC PROBLEMS DUNLOP
page.content: MAIN STREET IS THE BUSIEST STREET IN DUNLOP,CARRYING BOTH LORRIES AND CARS.THE HOUSES HAVE NO FRONT GARDENS AND THEY HAVE NO GARAGES SO THE PEOPLE PARK THEIR CARS ON BOTH SIDES OF THE ROAD.THE ROAD IS ON A SLOPE FROM THE TOP OF MAIN STREET TO THE CHURCH AT THE BOTTOM.THE ROAD IS BAD IN THE WINTER BECAUSE OF THE ICE.IN THE SUMMER THE ROAD IS NOT SO BUSY.THE TRAFFIC STARTS ABOUT 6 AM IN THE MORNING AND IS HEAVY THROUGHOUT THE DAY.IT IS TERRIBLY NOISY;THERE ARE LOTS OF BUMPS AND SCRAPES BECAUSE OF PEOPLE PARKING THEIR CARS ON THE ROAD SIDE AND BECAUSE THE ROAD IS SO NARROW. IT IS TERRIBLY HARD TO PARK YOUR CAR.WE ASKED JENNY CARRUTHERS IF THE ROAD AND THE TRAFFIC PROBLEMS WOULD BE THERE IN A 100 YEARS TIME AND JENNY CARRUTHERS SAID"OH DEFINITELY".
